main event: An Air Force pilot observed a UFO hovering and then departing at a high rate of speed over Kori, Kyushu Island, Japan, on October 5-6, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes., The object was approximately 20 to 25 feet in diameter and silver or white in color., No contrails, noise or exhaust were observed during the sighting., The object was seen hovering at about 2,000 ft altitude., The nature and origin of the object were considered to be possibly extraterrestrial but remained undetermined.
sighted object: a UFO approximately 20 to 25 feet in diameter
witness description: Air Force pilot on a routine ferry flight
